title: Peptic Ulcer Disease as a Common Cause of Bleeding in Patients with Coronavirus Disease 2019.
text: Peptic Ulcer Disease as a Common Cause of Bleeding in Patients with Coronavirus Disease 2019.

similar.title: Novel Coronavirus Disease 2019 and Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Case Report.
text: Novel Coronavirus Disease 2019 and Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Case Report.

The novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has had a profound impact on healthcare systems around the world. The emergency department (ED) in particular has become the frontline for the identification and care of these patients. While its effects on respiratory symptoms are well recognized, neurologic manifestations have been rarer. We report the case of a patient who presented in cardiac arrest with the return of spontaneous circulation (ROSC). The patient was found to have subarachnoid hemorrhage and later tested positive for COVID-19.
abstract: The novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has had a profound impact on healthcare systems around the world. The emergency department (ED) in particular has become the frontline for the identification and care of these patients. We report the case of a patient who presented in cardiac arrest with the return of spontaneous circulation (ROSC). The patient was found to have subarachnoid hemorrhage and later tested positive for COVID-19.
